text: Matt Blunt (born November 20, 1970) is an American politician. He was the Governor of Missouri from 2005 to 2009. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party. Blunt was born on November 20, 1970 in Greene County, Missouri. He graduated from the United States Naval Academy. He is married to Melanie Blunt. They have two children. ==Other websites== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Missouri Category:People from Springfield, Missouri Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Matt Blunt
